## Libraries
```{r}
#| results: false
#| code-fold: true
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Data wrangling
```{r}
#| results: false
#| code-fold: true
focus <- "Asia"
lon0 <- 100
lat0 <- 45
proj <- str_glue("+proj=ortho lon_0={lon0} lat_0={lat0}")

data("World")
world <- World %>%
  st_make_valid() %>%
  select(continent)

world_o <- world %>%
  st_transform(proj) %>%
  st_make_valid() %>%
  filter(!st_is_empty(.)) %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  summarise() 

continent <- world %>%
  filter(continent == focus)
```

## `tmap`
```{r}
tm_shape(world_o) +
  tm_fill() + 
  tm_shape(continent) +
  tm_fill(fill = "red") +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE)
```

## `ggplot2`
```{r}
ggplot(world_o) +
  geom_sf(linewidth = 0) +
  geom_sf(
    data = continent, 
    fill = "red", 
    linewidth = 0) +
  theme_void()
```
